layer at (0,0) size 800x256
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x256
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x232
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 280x19
          text run at (0,0) width 280: "Adding outline should not affect layer positions"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,222) size 10x10
